c74object.name: bruits.plaits~
c74object.digest: Mutable Instruments plaits wrapped as max/msp external
c74object.description: Mutable Instruments plaits wrapped as max/msp external.see https://mutable-instruments.net/modules/plaits/

attribute.name: timbre
attribute.digest: Timbre sweeps the spectral content from dark/sparse to bright/dense
attribute.description: Timbre sweeps the spectral content from dark/sparse to bright/dense.

attribute.name: harmonics
attribute.digest: Harmonics controls the frequency spread or the balance between the various constituents of the tone
attribute.description: Harmonics controls the frequency spread or the balance between the various constituents of the tone.
